MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA2 area of Paisley, affecting properties in Foxbar Drive and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network on Foxbar Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:31pm on Monday, 05 April 2021
